item.description:
First and foremost: Olga's has the best coffee, ever, ever, ever. Other than that we'll do some introductions and then move on to everyones current Intranet development environment including likes and dislikes and dream about our pie-in-the-sky setup. Time permitting, we'll talk about the group itself and discuss ways to promote and grow it.

This is a lunch-hour meeting so bring your appetite - you can buy lunch at the cafe or brown-bag it. Hope to see you there!

For more information, see http://maketiny.com/3...

group.name: Providence Web Development Lunch Hour Meetup Group

item.name: The Providence Intranet Developers Group July Meetup
